All Implemented Interfaces:
RepositoryManager
public class XMLRepositoryManager
extends Object
implements RepositoryManager

Version:
$Revision$

A RepositoryManager that manages Product policy based on an xml file called product-types.xml.

Author:
mattmann, bfoster
